Package org.nasdanika.cli

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ContextBuilder
    Builds context.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CommandBase
    Base class for Nasdanika CLI commands
    CommandGroup
    A base class for commands which are used for grouping and do not provide own functionality but may contain options which can be accessed by their children via a field annotated with CommandLine.ParentCommand.
    ContextCommand
    Base class for commands which build Context from command line options.
    DelegatingCommand
    Base class for commands which create Context and ProgressMonitor and then delegate execution to CommandLine.Command created by CommandFactory obtained from getCommandFactory() abstract protected method which subclasses shall override.
    HelpCommand  
    ProgressMonitorMixin
    Mixes in progress monitor.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Description
    Specifies a classloader markdown resource with a detailed description of a command.
